title: 2 bedroom flat for rent
description: Short Let: A beautifully presented two bedroom, two bathroom apartment set within the prestigious Warwick Square. This spacious home features a bright reception and dining area, a fully equipped high-spec kitchen, two generous double bedrooms, and modern bathrooms. Offered fully furnished to a high standard, the property benefits from private outdoor space, ample built-in storage, and access to the exclusive communal garden square. Perfect for professionals seeking central London living, this exceptional short let includes all bills. <PARA> Westminster provides a unique peaceful blend of historical elegance, modern luxury and exceptional amenities. The neighbourhood, renowned for its grand white stucco facades and quiet mews, offers a tranquil residential atmosphere while being in the heart of London. Westminster offers the excitement of central London as well as the tranquillity of secluded residential streets and green open spaces, calling Westminster home means your lifestyle has endless variety. From the world-famous shopping of nearby Bond and Oxford Street to the newly redeveloped districts of Victoria, there’s always something to see or do. The area's cultural richness is immense, with a plethora of art dealers on Pimlico Road and proximity to world-class museums like the Victoria & Albert Museum and the Natural History Museum in nearby South Kensington. While Westminster itself is a peaceful enclave, it has easy access to renowned theatres and cinemas like The Royal Court theatre on Sloane Square and Everyman Cinema in nearby Chelsea. For recreation and relaxation, residents enjoy exclusive private garden squares and many walk to the expansive green spaces of St. James’s Park and Hyde Park. Transport links are excellent, with multiple tube stations including Pimlico, St. James’s Park, Sloane Square and Victoria providing quick and easy access to the rest of London and beyond. Close by is the headquarters of John D Wood & Co on Belgrave Square and our hugely popular Elizabeth Street residential property office.
